attributes.action: Introduce an immediate ban on social media access for anyone in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: There is compelling evidence from may research studies that such access adversely impacts a young person by rewiring the synapses in their brains, leading to isolation, depression and mental ill-health. This causes numerous pressure and problems for the child, parents, carers, society and the NHS.
attributes.background: Ban the purchase or use of smartphones or other devices that can access social media platforms for any UK resident until they attain the age of 16.
